Translations.Text: ‘‘ – allahana horatu. Mattu nivu avarige narakada dari torisiri
mattu avarannu tadeyiri. Khanditavagiyu avara vicarane nadeyabekagide
nimagenagide? Niveke paraspara neravaguttilla
nijavagi, indu avaru sampurna saranagi bittiddare
(andu) avaralli kelavaru matte kelavaredege tirugi prasnegalannu keluvaru
(avaru tam'ma nayakarodane) ‘‘nivu bala bhagadinda nam'ma balige baruttiddiri (satyadinda nam'mannu tadeyuttiddiri)’’ ennuvaru
avaru (nayakaru) heluvaru; ‘‘nijavagi, nivu satyavannu nambuvavare agiralilla’’
‘‘nim'ma mele namage adhikaravenu iralilla. Nijavagi nive vidrohi pangadavagiddiri’’
‘‘idiga nam'ma kuritu nam'ma odeyana matu satyavagi bittide. Naviga (sikseyannu) khandita saviyaliddeve’’
‘‘Navu nim'mannu darigedisiddu matravalla, svatah nave darigettiddevu’’
konege, avarellaru joteyagiye sikse anubhavisuvaru
navu aparadhigalige higeye madutteve
allahana horatu beraru pujar'haralla endu avarodane helaladaga avaru ahankara toriddaru
mattu ‘‘navenu obba huccu pidita kavigagi nam'ma devarugalannu bittu bidabeke?’’ Endu avaru keeluttiddaru
nijavagi avaru (devadutaru), satyadondige bandiruttare mattu avaru (hindina) devadutarugalannu samarthisuttare
nivu khandita yatanamaya sikseyannu saviyuviri
mattu nimage nivesaguttidda karmagala phalavaste sigalide
allahana ayda dasara horatu
avarigagi nirdista aharavide
hannugalu ive mattu avaru gauravanvitaragiruvaru
kodugegalu tumbiruva svarga totagalalli
eduru badiragiruva asanagalalli
hariyuva cilumegala paniyagalannu avara sutta oyyalaguvudu
avu subhravagiddu, kudiyuvavarige rucikaravagiruvavu
adarinda, yavude sankatavagadu mattu avaru mada mattaragalararu
avara bali drsti taggisiruva, visala kanninavaru (sevakiyaru) iruvaru
avaru, adagisitta mottegalante (subhra hagu nirmalaragi) iruvaru
avaru (svargavasigalu) eduru baduragi paraspararodane vicarisuvaru
avarallobbanu heluvanu; nanagobba sangati iddanu
avanu nannodane heluttiddanu; ‘‘ninenu (paralokavannu) nambuvavanagiruveya?’’
‘‘Navu sattu kevala mannu hagu elubugalagi bitta balika namage pratiphala sigalikkideye?’’
Avanu (matte) ‘‘niviga (ata elliddanendu) inuki nodalu bayasuttira?’’ Endu keluvanu
taruvaya avanu (svatah) inuki noduvanu hagu tanna sangatiyannu narakada madhyadalli kanuvanu
mattu avanu heluvanu; ‘‘allahanane! Ninantu nannannu nasa madiye biduttidde’’
Nanna odeyana anugrahavillade hogiddare, nanu (bandhigalagi) hajarugolisaladavara salige seriruttidde
(svargavasigalu heluvaru;) innu namagenu maranavillave
– nam'ma prathama maranada horatu? Mattu navu siksegu guriyagalarevu
khanditavagiyu iduve maha saubhagyavagide
sramisuvavarella idakkagiye sramisabeku
i atithya uttamavo athava ‘jhakkum’ maravo
khanditavagiyu navu adannu akramigala palige parikseyagisiruvevu
adu narakada taladinda beleyuva mara
adara gellugalu saitanara talegalantiruvavu
avaru (narakavasigalu) khandita adanne tinnuvaru mattu adarindale tam'ma hotte tumbuvaru
hageye, alli avarigagi malin'ya bereta, kudiyuttiruva paniyaviruvudu
konege, narakave avaru maraluva neleyagiruvudu
avaru, tam'ma purvajaru darigettiddannu kandiddaru
adaru, avaru avara hejje gurutugalanne anusarisidaru
nijavagi, avariginta hindina, avara purvajaralli heccinavaru darigettiddaru
navu avara naduve dutarannu kalisiddevu
hige eccarike padedavara gati enayitembudannu nodiri
allahana ayda dasara sthiti matra bhinnavagide
nuharu namage more ittaru. Navu (moregalige) atyuttama uttara niduvavaragiddeve
navu avarannu avara maneyavarannu maha vipattininda raksisidevu
mattu navu avara santatiyannu bahukala ulisidevu
mattu navu mundinavaralli avara nenapannu sanraksisidevu
nuharige santi, sarvalokagalalli
khanditavagiyu navu ide riti satkarmigalannu puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasaragiddaru
taruvaya navu itararannu mulugisi bittevu
innu, ibrahimarantu avara (nuhara) hadiyalle nadeyuvavaragiddaru
